void blikac(void)
{
	static uint32_t delay;
	static uint32_t LED_TIME_BLINK = 300;


	if (Tick > delay + LED_TIME_BLINK) {
		GPIOA->ODR ^=(1<<4);
		delay = Tick;
	}
}

void EXTI0_1_IRQHandler(void)
{
	if (EXTI->PR & EXTI_PR_PR0) { // check line 0 has triggered the IT
		EXTI->PR |= EXTI_PR_PR0; // clear the pending bit
		GPIOB->ODR ^= GPIO_ODR_0;
	}
}

void tlacitka()
{
	static uint32_t old_s2;
	uint32_t new_s2 = GPIOC->IDR & (1<<0);
	static uint32_t off_time;
	static uint32_t LED_TIME_SHORT = 100;

	// S2
	if (old_s2 && !new_s2) { // falling edge
		off_time = Tick + LED_TIME_SHORT;
		GPIOB->BSRR = (1<<0);
	}
	old_s2 = new_s2;

	if (Tick > off_time) {
		GPIOB->BRR = (1<<0);
	}

	// S1
	static uint32_t old_s1;
	uint32_t new_s1 = GPIOC->IDR & (1<<1);
	static uint32_t LED_TIME_LONG = 1000;

	if (old_s1 && !new_s1) { // falling edge
		off_time = Tick + LED_TIME_LONG;
		GPIOB->BSRR = (1<<0);
	}
	old_s1 = new_s1;

	if (Tick > off_time) {
		GPIOB->BRR = (1<<0);
	}
}

void tlacitka2()
{
	static uint32_t old_s2;
	uint32_t new_s2 = GPIOC->IDR & (1<<0);
	static uint32_t LED_TIME_SHORT = 100;

	static uint32_t old_s1;
	uint32_t new_s1 = GPIOC->IDR & (1<<1);
	static uint32_t LED_TIME_LONG = 1000;

	static uint32_t off_time;


	static unit16_t delay_5 = 5;
	static unit16_t delay_40 = 40;

	// S2
	if (old_s2 && !new_s2) { // falling edge
		off_time = Tick + LED_TIME_SHORT;
		GPIOB->BSRR = (1<<0);
	}
	old_s2 = new_s2;

	if (Tick > off_time + delay_40)
	{
		GPIOB->BRR = (1<<0);
	}

	//S1
	if (GPIOC->IDR & (1<<1))
	{
		static uint16_t debounce = 0xFFFF;
		debounce <<= 1;
		if (new_s1) debounce |= 0x0001;

		if (old_s1 && !new_s1) { // falling edge
			off_time = Tick + LED_TIME_LONG;
			GPIOB->BSRR = (1<<0);
		}
		old_s1 = new_s1;

		if (Tick > off_time + delay_5) {
			GPIOB->BRR = (1<<0);
		}
	}
}
